t: Amazon's 'Cross' almost gets James Patterson detective right: Review
s: November 14, 2024 - And Amazon is so darn close to it, it's almost worse than if they got Dr. Cross completely wrong. "Cross" (now streaming, ★★ out of four) is the first TV show based on the book series, and this time Cross is portrayed by Aldis Hodge in pure smoldering glory.
